instructions.general: Prague Parking configuration settings. Edit carefully.

vehicleSizeInfo.Bike: Takes 1/4 spot (1 space unit), costs 5 CZK/hour
vehicleSizeInfo.MC: Takes half a spot (2 space units), costs 10 CZK/hour
vehicleSizeInfo.Car: Takes 1 spot (4 space units), costs 20 CZK/hour
vehicleSizeInfo.Bus: Takes 4 spots (16 space units), costs 80 CZK/hour, allowed only in spots 1-50

instructions.rules: First 10 minutes are free for all vehicles. Large vehicles such as buses can only park in designated high-ceiling spots (1-50).
